title: Minneapolis
summary: Minneapolis (/ˌmɪniˈæpəlɪs/ (listen)) is the most populous city in the U.S. state of Minnesota and the seat of Hennepin County.[6] With a population of 429,954 as of 2020, it is the 46th most populous city in the US.[7] Minneapolis lies on both banks of the Mississippi River, just north of the river's confluence with the Minnesota River at historic Fort Snelling, and adjoins Saint Paul, the state's capital.
